metadata.description: 2222 architecturally designed homes, interoperable with all major metaverses. Every NFT provides access to accompanying 3D model files so you can experience your home in The Otherside, Decentraland, Sandbox, Cornerstone and other metaverses, in addition to Unreal Engine, Unity, Android, Oculus Quest 2 and HTC Vive. All staked Estates yield $EQUITY, used to decorate, renovate and burn-to-upgrade homes. Read more at TheEstates.io.
metadata.name: Estate #1
